translation.en: Fuck yes.
You need a towel, miss.
I need a drink, Brian, but I'd settle for a towel, thank you.
translation.fr:
Plutôt un verre,
mais une serviette fera l'affaire.

translation.en: That closet is magic. Oh, it's just the basics really, miss.
translation.fr:
- C'est une armoire magique.
- C'est le strict minimum.

translation.en: When the apocalypse comes, I hope I'm with you.
translation.fr:
À l'apocalypse,
je vous veux à mes côtés.

translation.en: -It would be my pleasure. -[woman chuckles]
Glad to hear luck went your way in the Butler trial.
translation.fr:
La chance était de votre côté
au procès Butler.

translation.en: -What do you mean "luck"? -[Brian chuckles]
I don't know how you do it, miss.
[woman] Anything decent come in?
There is something in your pigeonhole.
translation.fr: On a déposé un dossier pour vous.

translation.en: Next-level stuff, I'd say.
Intriguing. I'll take a look.
Shall I wait?
No. You should go.
Are you sure there's nothing I can do?
translation.fr: Je ne peux vous aider en rien ?

translation.en: Yes, there is, Brian.
Have a glorious weekend.
There you go, madam.
-[waitress] Champagne? -Thank you.
-[woman] Hi, Sophie. -Hello, darling. Hi.
-[woman 2] Mrs Whitehouse. How are you? -Oh hello.
-What could be bad on this beautiful day? -[woman 2 chuckles]
translation.fr:
Une si belle journée
est forcément de bon augure.

translation.en: -[woman 4] There she is. -Hello, hello.
-Where's your handsome half? -That is a very good question.
translation.fr:
- Où est ton charmant mari ?
- Très bonne question.

translation.en: He promised he would leave the constituency on time for once, but…
translation.fr:
Il avait pourtant promis
de quitter la permanence à l'heure.

translation.en: -How's the birthday boy? -In denial.
translation.fr:
- Et le héros de la fête ?
- Dans le déni.

translation.en: -[Sophie] Hello. -I don't like the number 44.
translation.fr:
- Bonsoir.
- Je n'aime pas le nombre 44.

translation.en: Oh, but 44 is the luckiest number in ancient Egypt.
translation.fr:
Ce nombre portait chance
dans l'Égypte ancienne.

translation.en: -Highly associated with wealth and wisdom. -Is that true?
translation.fr:
- Synonyme de richesse et sagesse.
- Vraiment ?

translation.en: No. I just made it up. [chuckles]
-Cheeky Sophie. -[man 2] Happy birthday.
You have half your whole life ahead of you.
translation.fr: Tu as la vie devant toi.

translation.en: We are lucky.
-Where's James? -Let me find out.
translation.fr:
- Où est James ?
- Je vais me renseigner.

translation.en: -Happy birthday, Mark. -Excuse me. Sorry.
-[Lucy] Hello. -You've reached James Whitehouse. Please leave your name and number. I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
translation.fr:
Vous avez appelé James Whitehouse.
Laissez vos coordonnées, je vous rappelle.

translation.en: My darling man, where the fuck are you?
translation.fr: Mon chéri adoré, où es-tu, putain ?

translation.en: [woman] I counted.
I stood on the kerb, and I counted.
translation.fr: J'étais sur le trottoir et j'ai compté.

translation.en: And the little green man flashed for a mere five seconds.
translation.fr:
Le bonhomme vert a clignoté
seulement cinq secondes.

translation.en: -Well, that's not enough time, is it? -No, it's not, Minister.
translation.fr:
- Ce n'est pas assez.
- Non, M. le Ministre.

translation.en: I mean, I think they decided that pedestrian crossings
translation.fr:
Je crois qu'il a été décidé qu'une seconde par mètre
suffisait pour traverser.

translation.en: only needed a second per metre.
translation.fr:
qu'une seconde par mètre
suffisait pour traverser.

translation.en: Now, I know that you do have more important things to consider,
translation.fr:
Je sais que vous avez
des affaires plus importantes,

translation.en: but show me an old bird who could manage that.
translation.fr:
mais une vieille pie comme moi
pourrait s'en charger.

translation.en: First of all, show me an old bird, Mrs Murray.
And I take the safety of my constituents personally.
translation.fr: La sécurité de mes électeurs m'est chère.

translation.en: What I want for my family is what I want for Mrs Sibyl Murray of Thurlsdon.
translation.fr:
Ma famille compte autant
que Mme Murray de Thurlsdon.

translation.en: We'll write a letter.
-Right away. -Thank you very much indeed.
translation.fr: Nous allons leur écrire, immédiatement. Merci infiniment.

translation.en: -[James] Got everything? Okay. -[woman] Yes, sir.
[James] Straight home, please.
-[driver] Sure. -Thank you.
-Would you go back? -[Sophie] To Corsica?
In a heartbeat.
It was the most relaxing holiday of my life.
translation.fr:
Les vacances
les plus relaxantes de ma vie.

translation.en: James taught the kids how to sail, and I sat on the beach and remembered that I knew how to read.
translation.fr:
James a appris la voile aux enfants
et j'ai redécouvert la lecture.

translation.en: -Four novels. Heaven. -[cell phone chimes]
Oh. Speak of the devil.
[man] I'd be happy to die in Corsica, as a matter of fact.
translation.fr: Je pourrais finir mes jours en Corse.

translation.en: [Lucy] I nearly did die in Corsica.
I didn't know about this thing called anaphylactic shock.
Yes, it was before I knew about my shellfish allergy.
translation.fr: avant mon allergie aux fruits de mer.

translation.en: Three bites of shrimp. My face…
[whispers] Sorry. I have to go.
…it blew up like a balloon. It was absolutely…
translation.fr:
Comme un ballon. J'étais toute bouffie.
Ma gorge s'est serrée…

translation.en: It was just enormous.
translation.fr:
J'étais toute bouffie.
Ma gorge s'est serrée…

translation.en: -My throat closed off, I got sick… -Sophie?
translation.fr:
J'étais toute bouffie.
Ma gorge s'est serrée… Sophie ?

translation.en: What's going on?
James can't make it. There's been some sort of emergency,
translation.fr: James ne peut pas venir. Une urgence.

translation.en: which usually means a debate about noise pollution, but…
translation.fr: Sûrement un débat sur la pollution sonore…

translation.en: Is everything okay?
Absolutely. Yes.
-Well, then you should stay. -[Sophie] I can't. I heard from Krystyna.
translation.fr:
- Alors, reste.
- Non. Krystyna m'a appelée.

translation.en: She's not feeling well, so I have to take over with the kids.
translation.fr:
Elle se sent mal,
je dois m'occuper des enfants.

translation.en: This was so lovely. Thank you.
That was rather embarrassing.
I invented three separate excuses in less than 30 seconds on your behalf.
translation.fr:
J'ai inventé trois excuses
en moins de 30 secondes.

translation.en: James?
You owe me.
I've fucked up, big time.
Does she have a last name?
Lytton.
Olivia Lytton.
You've probably met her. She's one of my aides.
translation.fr: Tu as dû la rencontrer, une assistante.

translation.en: -Administrative? -Parliamentary researcher.
So she's new? Relatively.
translation.fr:
- Elle est nouvelle ?
- Plus ou moins.

translation.en: And young?
It had been going on for about five months.
translation.fr: Ça a duré environ cinq mois.

translation.en: I broke it off two weeks ago, right after the party conference.
translation.fr:
J'ai rompu il y a deux semaines,
après le congrès du parti.

translation.en: It meant nothing.
I was flattered.
It was just sex.
Not that there's ever been anything wrong with that part of us.
translation.fr: Non pas que cela faisait défaut entre nous, tu le sais.

translation.en: You know that.
I'm so sorry, Soph.
There's more.
You're not telling me just to tell me
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas un simple aveu

translation.en: to unburden yourself.
There's more.
-Is she pregnant? -No. God, no.
translation.fr:
- Elle est enceinte ?
- Non, Dieu merci.

translation.en: The story is about to break.
-When? -Tonight.
The Mail is splashing it tomorrow. Online, late tonight.
translation.fr:
Demain dans le Daily Mail.
Ce soir en ligne.

translation.en: Chris Clarke's on his way over.
He's coming here? Now?
We have to get ahead of this.
We have to figure out how to protect our children from it.
translation.fr: On doit penser à protéger nos enfants.

translation.en: We have to do both.
[woman] Can't believe I haven't started my Christmas shopping yet.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas commencé mes achats de Noël.

translation.en: [man] Well, you can buy me a drink and save on gift wrap.
translation.fr:
Offre-moi un verre,
tu n'auras pas à l'emballer.

translation.en: [man 2] Hello!
Called to see if you fancied a drink.
-It sounds like you did. -Join us.
I'm not in the mood for a crowd.
[man 2] Well, you should be. I heard about the Butler result.
translation.fr:
Tu devrais,
vu le verdict du procès Butler.

translation.en: -The truth won today. -[door closes]
No, no, no. Kate Woodcroft won today.
Not many lawyers could've pulled that one off.
[man 2] It's the Christmas season. Come and join us.
translation.fr: C'est les fêtes de Noël. Rejoins-nous.

translation.en: I hate Christmas.
I would have had you over tonight, but Felicity decided to stay in town.
translation.fr:
Je t'aurais bien invitée ce soir,
mais Felicity a décidé de rester.

translation.en: Oh, how unfelicitous.
translation.fr: Eh bien, je ne la félicite pas.

translation.en: [man 2] See you soon?
[Kate] Of course.
Have fun.
[Chris] "Top Tory cheats with aide," that's the headline.
translation.fr:
"Un Top Tory couche avec son assistante."
C'est le gros titre.

translation.en: I mean, it's not brilliant, but could be worse.
translation.fr:
Ce n'est pas fameux,
mais ça pourrait être pire.

translation.en: God knows these knobheads are capable.
translation.fr:
Dieu sait de quoi
ces idiots sont capables.

translation.en: "PM's friend in trysts in the corridors of power." Don't like that.
translation.fr:
"L'ami du Premier ministre fricote
dans les allées du pouvoir." Mauvais.

translation.en: Oh for fuck's sake.
"Britain's most fanciable MP
had sex with his female aide in a lift in the Commons."
translation.fr:
"a couché avec son assistante
dans un ascenseur de Westminster."

translation.en: Uh, "James Whitehouse, a Home Office minister and confidant of the prime minister,
translation.fr:
"James Whitehouse,
ministre de l'Intérieur et ami du PM,

translation.en: uh, conducted his affair with his parliamentary researcher
translation.fr:
"a eu cette liaison
avec son attachée parlementaire

translation.en: in the Palace of Westminster.
The married father of two also shared a room
translation.fr: "Ce père marié a fait chambre commune

translation.en: with stunning Olivia Lytton, 28, during the party conference."
translation.fr:
"avec la renversante Olivia Lytton,
28 ans, "pendant le congrès du parti."

translation.en: [chuckles] Well, that was fucking stupid. Literally.
[Chris] So she's a classic woman scorned. Is that it? I can't speak for her.
translation.fr:
- Le cliché de la femme éconduite ?
- Je ne sais pas.

translation.en: [Chris] But did you speak to her leading up to this?
translation.fr: Mais tu lui as parlé avant ça ?

translation.en: -Did you know this was coming? -[James] No.
[Chris] "He used her"…
[Chris] Basically, your priority from now on
is to rebuild trust all around.
[James] The party conference is not funded by taxpayers.
translation.fr:
Le congrès n'est pas payé
par le contribuable.

translation.en: [Chris] Think anyone's making distinctions?
Johnny Public bankrolls your salary as a minister in Her Majesty's government.
translation.fr:
Madame Michu finance ton salaire
de ministre du gouvernement.

translation.en: No one's paying you to bang the help in a House of Commons lift.
translation.fr:
On ne te paie pas pour baiser
dans l'ascenseur.

translation.en: -[James] She has a brilliant mind. -[Chris] That'd make a better headline.
translation.fr:
- Elle est brillante.
- Ça ferait un meilleur titre.

translation.en: "Minister bangs brainy bombshell."
-Alliterative and to the point. -[James] Christ almighty, Chris.
translation.fr:
- Allitératif et droit au but.
- Arrête, veux-tu ?

translation.en: [James] I don't give a fuck about Johnny Public.
translation.fr: Je me fous de madame Michu.

translation.en: [Chris] Johnny Public's gonna be reading this in the Daily Mail.
translation.fr:
Madame Michu lira ça dans le Daily Mail.
Tu veux qu'on en parle ?

translation.en: Do you want to have a little chat about it?
translation.fr:
Madame Michu lira ça dans le Daily Mail.
Tu veux qu'on en parle ? Mme Michu me soutiendra, j'en suis sûr.

translation.en: [James] Johnny Public will support me. I'm sure of it.
translation.fr: Mme Michu me soutiendra, j'en suis sûr.

translation.en: I expect she'll be dubbed "the ravishing researcher."
You're not gonna be springing any surprises on us?
translation.fr: Tu ne vas pas nous faire des misères ?

translation.en: Such as?
Well, announcing that you're leaving. Putting on your side of the story.
translation.fr:
Annoncer que tu pars,
donner ta version de l'histoire.

translation.en: Do you need to ask?
translation.fr:
- Tu dois demander ça ?
- Bien sûr.

translation.en: -Of course I do. -Of course she's not leaving.
translation.fr:
- Tu dois demander ça ?
- Bien sûr. Bien sûr qu'elle ne part pas.

translation.en: -Sorry. I didn't mean to-- -[Sophie] Of course I'm not leaving.
translation.fr:
- Désolé…
- Bien sûr que je ne pars pas.

translation.en: We've been married for 12 years. We share two children.
translation.fr:
On est mariés depuis 12 ans.
On a deux enfants.

translation.en: Why would I throw all that away over a stupid mistake?
translation.fr:
Pourquoi tout balancer
pour une erreur stupide ?

translation.en: And there's no need to offer my resignation?
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas besoin de démissionner ?

translation.en: The PM will make it clear if he wants that, but he doesn't abandon his old friends,
translation.fr:
Si le Premier ministre le veut.
Mais il ne lâche pas ses amis.

translation.en: especially not his closest, and you're one of those.
translation.fr:
Surtout pas ses proches amis
et tu en fais partie.

translation.en: Says so right here.
Besides, sex doesn't have to kill a career these days.
translation.fr:
Et le sexe ne coule pas une carrière
de nos jours.

translation.en: You might even gain some fans amongst the older male voter.
translation.fr:
Tu pourrais même t'attirer
l'électorat d'hommes âgés.

translation.en: [chuckles] I mean, they're hardly gonna argue with some touchy-feely,
translation.fr: Ils se fichent bien que tu fricotes,

translation.en: some fun on the side with a filly.
translation.fr: que tu t'amuses avec une pouliche.

translation.en: She's a woman, not a horse.
I'm trying to help your husband.
And you, for that matter.
Well, try not to reveal too much of yourself in the process.
translation.fr:
Essaie de ne pas trop révéler
de ta personne.

translation.en: Someone's coming out punching. That is very good.
translation.fr: Je la sens combative. C'est très bien.

translation.en: That is exactly what we need right now.
Uh, so listen. No details, but also no denials.
translation.fr: Aucun détails, mais également, aucun démenti.

translation.en: Denials have a way of coming back to bite you on the arse.
translation.fr:
Ils vous reviennent toujours
en pleine gueule.

translation.en: Therefore, do not elaborate.
The sum of your script is this, deep regret, brief affair,
translation.fr: En résumé, tu dis : profond regret, brève liaison,

translation.en: prioritise your family and constituents,
translation.fr: priorité à ta famille et tes électeurs.

translation.en: deflect and dismiss, but never deny. Got it?
translation.fr:
Dévie et élude,
mais ne démens jamais. Vu ?

translation.en: -Who's there? -[girl] Me.
[James] Em?
-Were you sitting on the stairs? -How long?
-Not long. -[James] You should be asleep, darling.
I heard voices.
-Hello, Emily. -Remember Mr Clarke?
[Sophie] Let's get you back to bed. Come on.
[smacks lips] What's that Paul Newman quote?
"Why go out for hamburgers when you've got steak at home?"
translation.fr:
"Un burger
quand on a un steak chez soi ?"

translation.en: Listen to me, you little prick. This isn't a fucking joke, it's my life.
translation.fr:
Écoute, petit con.
C'est pas un jeu, c'est ma vie.

translation.en: I love her. Got it?
Oh, mate. I'm only here because the PM told me to be.
translation.fr: Mon vieux, je suis là à la demande du PM.

translation.en: Quite. So do your fucking job, mate,
translation.fr:
Exactement.
Alors, fais ton putain de boulot, "vieux",

translation.en: and help me fix it.
Is it over?
[whispers] Yes.
Five months?
It was, as you said, a stupid mistake.
translation.fr:
C'était, comme tu l'as dit,
une erreur stupide.

translation.en: [Sophie] At the party conference?
Where else?
Work mostly. Usually late at night.
translation.fr:
Au travail, surtout.
Généralement tard le soir.

translation.en: What, on desks?
In the broom cupboard?
On the right honourable leather sofa?
Did the whole office know?
[James] We were careful.
Apparently not.
Hotel rooms?
[James] A few times.
-[Sophie] How many? -Well, I didn't count.
I would like to have a number in mind.
translation.fr: J'aimerais avoir un chiffre en tête.

translation.en: -I would find that helpful. -I don't know. 20, 30.
translation.fr: Ça m'aiderait. Je ne sais pas, 20, 30.

translation.en: She doesn't mean anything to me. It was just sex.
translation.fr:
Elle n'est rien pour moi.
C'était que du sexe.

translation.en: -Nothing's just sex. -But it was, Soph.
translation.fr:
- Rien n'est que du sexe.
- Pour moi, si.

translation.en: It was.
I've been so stressed out at work these past many months.
translation.fr:
J'étais si stressé au travail
ces derniers mois.

translation.en: I'm honoured to have the immigration portfolio, but it is impossibly complex and literally life and death.
translation.fr:
L'immigration, c'est un honneur,
mais une lourde responsabilité.

translation.en: I haven't even told you a fraction of it.
translation.fr: Je ne t'en ai pas raconté la moitié.

translation.en: She… she was just there.
I was weak.
For the life of me, it's a mystery how it even start--
That's enough.
I'm going to bed.
-Oh my God. I'm sorry. -[Olivia] Sorry, James.
-Minister. -Olivia.
Can I get you a cab?
Yes.
Or you could get me another drink.
[James] I'll keep this simple.
Before you stands a man who made a mistake.
translation.fr: Vous avez devant vous un homme fautif.

translation.en: [James] My brief affair with a colleague
translation.fr: Ma brève liaison avec une collègue

translation.en: showed disrespect to my marriage,
to my family, and to the trust of my constituents.
translation.fr:
envers ma famille
et la confiance de mes électeurs.

translation.en: As I sometimes say to my children,
translation.fr: Comme je le dis parfois à mes enfants,

translation.en: under vastly less serious circumstances,
translation.fr: dans des circonstances bien moins graves,

translation.en: "not okay."
Forgiveness and understanding must be earned,
translation.fr:
Le pardon et la compréhension se méritent,
c'est donc trop tôt pour moi,

translation.en: so I don't presume to ask for those yet, but I do ask for patience
translation.fr:
Le pardon et la compréhension se méritent,
c'est donc trop tôt pour moi, mais accordez-moi votre patience

translation.en: as I try to repair the damage done to my beloved family
translation.fr:
pour réparer les dégâts
causés à ma famille adorée

translation.en: and my esteemed constituents.
translation.fr: et à mes électeurs que j'estime beaucoup.

translation.en: Thank you all.
That's all for today!
-Hello there. -[Sophie] Hi, Ellie.
It's nice to see you.
It's nice that it's not last week. [chuckles]
translation.fr: Et que la semaine soit passée.

translation.en: Apologies for bailing on Mark's birthday. Oh, don't give it another thought.
translation.fr:
- Pardon d'avoir quitté la fête.
- N'y pense plus.

translation.en: We'll be fine.
Of course you will.
Sometimes, I think sex is the root of all evil. [scoffs]
translation.fr: Le sexe est la source de tous les maux.

translation.en: That's rubbish. Sex is great.
At least, our sex is great. It's never been a problem for us.
translation.fr:
En tout cas, entre nous.
Ça n'a jamais été un problème.

translation.en: [inhales deeply] You're lucky.
And a very forgiving person.
Not really.
Like the man said, he made a mistake.
translation.fr: Il l'a dit, il a fait une erreur.

translation.en: A fling is just that.
You're right.
If mere infidelity were enough to ruin a marriage,
translation.fr: Si ça suffisait à briser un mariage,

translation.en: there wouldn't be an intact family in this whole bloody school.
translation.fr:
cette école aurait
plus d'une famille éclatée.

translation.en: It's an eyeball. She can see that.
translation.fr:
- C'est un œil.
- Elle n'est pas aveugle.

translation.en: -Bye. -[Emily] Can't wait to show Daddy.
-[woman] Prime Minister. -Afternoon.
-[man] Prime Minister. -Afternoon.
-Prime Minister. -[man 2] I believe he's in?
[man] Yes, indeed. I'll--
-[man 2] James. -Tom.
Can we get you anything? Does anyone have chocolate?
translation.fr:
- On peut t'offrir quelque chose ?
- Du chocolat.

translation.en: Chocolate?
Anything sweet. Just a nibble.
We've got Percy Pigs.
Oh cheers.
Still eating sweets, Mr Creosote?
[in French accent] Just a wafer-thin mint.
translation.fr: Juste un chocolat à la menthe.

translation.en: Thank you.
[James] Thank you for not hanging me out.
translation.fr: Merci de ne pas m'avoir dézingué.

translation.en: Yet.
-Well, this is the worst of it? -Yes.
I wish she hadn't been on your payroll.
I wish I had a time machine.
-[Tom] How's Sophie? -Pretty great.
Oh, she's always been that.
Forgiving.
I guess she's always been that too.
No.
This was the first time in 12 years of marriage, I swear on my life.
translation.fr:
C'était la première fois en 12 ans,
je le jure.

translation.en: Don't look so serious.
The past is the past as far as I'm concerned.
-Prime Minister, your diary-- -I know. Thank you.
I was planning to introduce the amendment to the immigration bill.
-With your blessing. -Yes. Amend away.
Now listen. Be good to that wife of yours.
You might think the public are looking to me,
translation.fr: Tu crois tous les yeux rivés sur moi,

translation.en: but they'll be looking to her.
translation.fr: mais ils le sont sur elle.

translation.en: -Mummy, what's a Libertine? -Beg your pardon?
translation.fr:
- Maman, c'est quoi, un Libertin ?
- Pardon ?

translation.en: It says here Daddy was a Libertine.
translation.fr:
C'est écrit ici
que papa était un Libertin.

translation.en: -[Sophie] What are you doing with that? -It was in the study.
translation.fr:
- Tu lis quoi ?
- C'était dans le bureau.

translation.en: I told you to stay out of the study. Don't be a snoop.
translation.fr:
Je t'ai interdit d'y entrer.
Arrête de fouiner.

translation.en: -Sorry. What would you like for dinner? -Pizza?
translation.fr:
- Désolée. Que veux-tu dîner ?
- Une pizza ?

translation.en: Pizza?
[Sophie] Good idea. Let's do it.
-But, Mummy, what is a Libertine? -[Sophie] Mmhmm?
translation.fr: Mais, maman ? C'est quoi, un Libertin ?

translation.en: Um, it was a club that Daddy was in at Oxford with Uncle Tom.
translation.fr:
Un club dont papa faisait partie
à Oxford avec oncle Tom.

translation.en: But what does the word mean?
It means someone who likes to have a good time.
Would you like a pepperoni or plain cheese?
-Plain cheese, please. -[Sophie] Okay. I'll call when it's ready.
translation.fr:
- Fromage.
- OK. Je t'appelle quand c'est prêt.

translation.en: Krystyna?
Wasn't she helping you with homework? We finished.
translation.fr:
- Elle t'aidait aux devoirs, non ?
- On a fini.

translation.en: I'm a Libertine.
No. You're not.
Why not?
Ask Daddy about it. Go, go. I'll call you when it's pizza.
translation.fr: Demande à papa. File, je t'appellerai.

translation.en: [Krystyna] Emily?
[man] Let's go! Libertines!
[woman] Sophie!
Fuck's sake.
Please tell me that puddle I stepped in was cider and not fresher piss.
translation.fr: Faites que cette flaque était du cidre et non de la pisse.

translation.en: More likely to be second or third-year piss.
translation.fr: Sûrement la pisse d'un 2e ou 3e année.

translation.en: [woman] To making it through our first week.
[Sophie] To escaping Mom and Dad.
-[woman] Sorry. -Sorry, sorry.
[woman 2] She lives outside of the library!
translation.fr:
Elle vit aussi
en dehors de la bibliothèque !

translation.en: -Very funny, Alison. -Oh, I didn't think you'd show.
translation.fr:
- Très drôle.
- Je ne pensais pas que tu viendrais.

translation.en: -You told me not to be such a spod. -And are you? A spod?
translation.fr:
Tu m'as dit de ne pas être rasoir. - Alors, tu es rasoir ?
- Oui.

translation.en: -Yes. -Oh, Holly Berry, Sophie Greenaway.
translation.fr:
- Alors, tu es rasoir ?
- Oui. Holly Berry, Sophie Greenaway.

translation.en: Holly Berry?
I was conceived on Christmas Eve.
translation.fr: J'ai été conçue la veille de Noël.

translation.en: -Christ. -Yeah. That was the other possibility.
[boys] Chug! Chug! Chug!
-What are they doing? -They're anal chugging.
translation.fr:
- Qu'est-ce qu'ils font ?
- Une fontaine anale.

translation.en: Anal what?
It's a drinking game the rugby boys like to play.
translation.fr: Un jeu à boire prisé des rugbymen.

translation.en: [Alison] Some of the club boys too.
I spot a trio of Libertines over there.
…and, while I will go to my grave
respecting the opinion of the honourable member from Morewood and Barnsford,
translation.fr:
avec tout le respect que je dois
à madame la députée,

translation.en: I must dispute her objections to this amendment.
translation.fr:
je contesterai ses objections
à cet amendement.

translation.en: The honourable lady is concerned about fairness.
translation.fr: L'honorable députée se soucie de l'équité.

translation.en: This proposed change to the immigration bill
translation.fr:
Cet amendement
au projet de loi sur l'immigration

translation.en: represents the most equitable approach to both skilled and low-skilled workers
translation.fr:
représente l'approche la plus équitable
pour tous les travailleurs

translation.en: of any legislation in the past 50 years!
translation.fr:
de toutes les lois
des 50 dernières années.

translation.en: -It is more inclusive, not less! -[indistinct clamoring]
Esteemed colleagues,
if I have learned anything in my 44 years on this Earth, it is this.
translation.fr:
si j'ai appris quelque chose en 44 ans,
c'est ceci.

translation.en: If it looks like a duck, walks like a duck, and quacks like a duck,
translation.fr:
Si ça ressemble à un canard,
marche et cancane comme un canard,

translation.en: vote aye for that duck.
And what about a duck caught having an affair
translation.fr:
Et un canard en délit d'adultère
avec un caneton

translation.en: with a duckling in his employ?
translation.fr:
Et un canard en délit d'adultère
avec un caneton à son service ?

translation.en: What does the honourable gentleman think such a duck should do?
translation.fr:
Que devrait faire ce canard,
honorable député ?

translation.en: Swim.
[woman] Order! Order!
So he acquitted himself well?
Oh, you mean other than having an affair with a subordinate half his age
translation.fr:
À part s'envoyer en l'air
avec une subalterne de 20 ans

translation.en: and fucking her in a Westminster lift before elevenses?
translation.fr:
À part s'envoyer en l'air
avec une subalterne de 20 ans à Westminster avant 11 h ?

translation.en: I mean today, in the House. And she's not half his age.
translation.fr:
Aujourd'hui, à la Chambre.
Et elle n'a pas 20 ans.

translation.en: -Looks it. -Plus, he's popular.
You're the one who told me he's number two on sexymp.co.uk, or whatever it is.
translation.fr:
Tu m'as dit qu'il était numéro deux
sur sexymp.co.uk.

translation.en: He's moved to number one.
Well, that's surely a first for a member of the Conservative Party.
translation.fr: Une première pour le Parti conservateur.

translation.en: Besides which, he's the most naturally gifted politician
translation.fr: Et puis, c'est le politicien le plus doué

translation.en: on our side of the Chamber.
[Chris] Still, if he gets full on MeToo'd,
translation.fr: Si MeToo le prend pour cible,

translation.en: it could start to make your loyalty look ill-advised.
It would make the public wonder what it's based on, Prime Minister.
translation.fr:
Le public s'interrogera
sur la raison de cette loyauté.

translation.en: History. Nothing more complicated.
James Whitehouse's famous shepherd's pie.
translation.fr: Le célèbre plat de James Whitehouse, le hachis parmentier.

translation.en: -Isn't that Granny's recipe? -[James] Only better.
translation.fr:
- C'est la recette de mamie, non ?
- En mieux.

translation.en: This is version 2.0.
We haven't had this in ages. I make it all the time.
translation.fr:
- Le dernier, ça remonte.
- J'en fais tout le temps.

translation.en: Really? Is that why you had Tuppence walk you through the recipe on three occasions?
translation.fr:
Tu as demandé la recette à Tuppence
à trois reprises, non ?

translation.en: I suppose it has been quite a while.
[James] Krystyna.
It's yummy, Daddy.
-Good. -Napkins.
[Krystyna] Mmm. Yes, James. Really good.
[boy] So yummy.
-Would you like some wine? -Please.
translation.fr:
- Tu veux du vin ?
- Oui, merci.

translation.en: -Krystyna, would you some? -No. Thank you.
I'd like to propose a toast.
-[Emily] To what? -To Mummy.
No. Why?
'Cause she's the most wonderful woman I know.
-To Mummy. -[all] To Mummy.
-[Sophie] Sorry. -No.
-[coughs, laughs] -[Olivia] So I read your draft proposal.
translation.fr: J'ai lu ton ébauche de proposition.

translation.en: [James] And?
I think it's cracking.
[James] Too bad. The hardliners are telling me it's too humane.
translation.fr: Les radicaux la trouvent trop humaine.

translation.en: What do you think? Can I have some more?
[laughs] Oh God, sorry. I'm sorry.
-[James laughing] -Oh, now it's empty.
[James] Well, that explains how you managed to take advantage of me.
translation.fr:
Ceci explique
comment tu as profité de moi.

translation.en: [Olivia] Oh yes. Sorry about that.
[woman] Where are you?
[Kate] At the office.
[woman] At this hour on a Friday?
That's bonkers. Come round for a drink.
translation.fr: N'importe quoi. Viens boire un verre.

translation.en: I'd love to, but I got pulled into something.
[woman] Oh, it's the holiday season.
For fuck's sake, live a little, Woodcroft.
translation.fr: Bon sang, vis un peu, Woodcroft.

translation.en: I'm already sipping a Scotch, you'll be happy to hear.
[woman] Good.
Well, you can chase it with some fizz.
A kid in my class's parents knew just what I asked Father Christmas for.
translation.fr:
Les parents d'un enfant de ma classe
ont deviné ma liste au Père Noël.

translation.en: -[Kate] Where are Ed and your kids? -He took them to a movie.
translation.fr:
- Où sont Ed et tes enfants ?
- Au cinéma.

translation.en: So I've, more or less, one more hour of peace, quiet, and laundry.
translation.fr: J'ai plus ou moins une heure de calme et de lessive.

translation.en: Come on. Please?
We can get pleasantly pissed while you watch me fold.
translation.fr: On picolera et tu me regarderas plier.

translation.en: Look, I'll just be distracted until I finish with these papers.
translation.fr:
Mon attention
serait accaparée par ce dossier.

translation.en: What is it?
The usual… [sighs] …but quite high-profile.
translation.fr:
Une affaire classique.
Mais à grand retentissement.

translation.en: I'm not sure I should take this one. Of course you should.
translation.fr:
- Je ne devrais peut-être pas accepter.
- Bien sûr que si.

translation.en: Look, I really shouldn't discuss it.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas en parler.

translation.en: Oh don't be ridiculous. You can certainly tell me.
translation.fr: Ne sois pas ridicule. À moi, tu peux.

translation.en: Love you.
[Sophie] Thanks, Kenneth. See you in a bit.
Yes.
[woman whispering] Is that Mrs Whitehouse?
Isn't that James Whitehouse's wife?
-Sophie. -Mrs Whitehouse.
[man] Can you give us a comment about your husband's affair?
Mrs Whitehouse.
[Olivia] James.
-Hi, it's Whitehouse. -[whispers] Hi.
-Can I take your coat? -Thanks.
-Really? -[James] I know.
Hello.
-You remember Lawrence Hughes-Davies? -Of course.
translation.fr:
- Tu te rappelles L. Hughes-Davies ?
- Mais oui.

translation.en: -[Sophie] How are you? -Very good.
-[Sophie] Good. Yeah. -Listen, I was just saying to James.
translation.fr: Je disais à James à l'instant.

translation.en: I've witnessed every kind of weather
translation.fr:
J'ai assisté
à toutes sortes de tempêtes

translation.en: in the three and a half decades I've been here.
This doesn't qualify as a squall. Not even a disturbance.
translation.fr:
Ceci n'est pas une bourrasque.
Pas même une petite perturbation.

translation.en: Just a bit of rain, dear.
And look… [chuckles] …it's passed.
Now, boys will be boys, but I'm sure this one has learned his lesson.
translation.fr:
Les garçons sont ce qu'ils sont.
Celui-ci a retenu la leçon.

translation.en: My wife always said, "Once, okay. Twice, go away."
translation.fr:
Ma femme disait :
"Une fois passe. Deux fois casse."

translation.en: I left it at once.
translation.fr: Je m'en suis tenu à une fois.

translation.en: Enjoy your tea. Hmm?
I'm sorry about that. [chuckles]
You know, I thought I was, um, fine coming here,
translation.fr: Je pensais avoir la force de venir ici,

translation.en: but it's bringing it all back.
The affair?
No.
No. My fear.
[James] About what?
I thought we were clear all those years ago.
translation.fr:
On avait mis ça au clair
il y a longtemps.

translation.en: I am not my mother.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas ma mère.

translation.en: I will not live my mother's life.
translation.fr: Je ne vivrai pas la vie de ma mère.

translation.en: I will not be the long-suffering spouse.
"Once, okay. Twice, go away." Fuck off.
translation.fr:
"Une fois passe, deux fois casse."
Mon cul !

translation.en: I'm not interested.
And I can't do it, James.
Especially in the fishbowl of politics.
translation.fr: Surtout avec ce voyeurisme en politique.

translation.en: I always thought that our marriage was, um…
translation.fr:
J'ai toujours pensé
que notre mariage était…

translation.en: …superior. [scoffs]
Immune.
Was that the lift?
[James] What do you mean?
The one that I just came up in.
translation.fr: Celui que je viens de prendre.

translation.en: Was that one of the sites of your affair?
translation.fr: C'était un des lieux de tes ébats ?

translation.en: The one that made the headlines?
translation.fr: Celui qui a fait les gros titres ?

translation.en: Jesus.
[James] I'm so sorry.
I should have found another…
It was thoughtless.
Soph, as awful as this week has been, and everything I put you through,
translation.fr: Sophie, malgré cette semaine horrible et ce que je t'ai fait subir,

translation.en: I am grateful for one thing.
translation.fr: je te remercie pour une chose.

translation.en: The certainty that you are the person I want to die with.
translation.fr: La certitude que tu es la personne avec qui je veux mourir.

translation.en: Would die for.
Making this right with you is all I care about.
translation.fr: Réparer le tort que je t'ai causé, c'est tout ce qui m'importe.

translation.en: [James] You and the kids.
If you tell me to…
I will give up all this.
I swear.
I will stand up right now and tell this room full of MPs that I resign.
translation.fr:
Je me lève et dis à tous ces députés
que je démissionne.

translation.en: Right now.
If that's what you want.
translation.fr: Si c'est ce que tu veux.

translation.en: If the future doesn't include you, Sophie Whitehouse,
translation.fr:
Si l'avenir ne t'inclut pas,
Sophie Whitehouse,

translation.en: the future is shite.
[James] You sure you don't want Kenneth to take you back?
You'll get home earlier this way.
translation.fr: Non, tu seras plus vite rentré.

translation.en: Come on, James!
[Sophie] Come on, James!
Bloody hell, they're fast.
They're unstoppable.
If only he were a bit dim, it might seem fair.
translation.fr:
Si seulement il était bête,
ça serait juste.

translation.en: But no, your boyfriend got dealt all the best cards,
translation.fr:
Mais non,
ton petit ami coche toutes les cases.

translation.en: including a spot as an Oxford Blue.
Adonis.
[Sophie] What?
It comes from the Canaanite word for "lord."
translation.fr:
Ça vient du mot cananéen
signifiant "seigneur".

translation.en: He's the god of beauty and desire.
translation.fr: Le dieu de la beauté et du désir.

translation.en: Holly, James Whitehouse is taken.
I'm going to marry that boy one day.
You gonna tell him you're gonna marry him?
He knows.
He just doesn't know that he knows. [chuckles]
translation.fr: Il ne sait pas qu'il le sait.

translation.en: [man] Oh, James.
Nice to see Sophie here. [James] Thank you.
translation.fr:
- Ravi de voir Sophie ici.
- Merci.

translation.en: -Mr Whitehouse. -[James] Yes?
Detective Sergeant Willis.
This is my colleague, Detective Constable Rydon.
We've been trying to contact you.
translation.fr: On a essayé de vous joindre.

translation.en: But your office seemed to have lost track of you.
Well, I switched my mobile off while I had tea with my wife.
translation.fr:
J'ai éteint mon portable,
j'étais avec ma femme.

translation.en: Criminal behaviour, I know. [chuckles]
-May I ask what this is about? -Olivia Lytton.
What about her?
We'd like to ask you a few questions in connection with an allegation.
translation.fr:

au sujet d'une accusation.

translation.en: An allegation of what? Rape, sir.
An allegation of rape.
